content: **crocheted hat in drops belle the piece is worked top down with treble and double crochets sizes s-l ** ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ drops design pattern no vs-069 yarn group b ------------------------------------------------------- **sizes** s - m - l fits head size 54/56 56/58 58/60 cm **materials** drops belle from garnstudio belongs to yarn group b 100-150-150 g colour 03 light beige **crochet gauge** 22 treble crochets in width and 11 row in height = 10 x 10 cm crochet hook drops crochet hook size 3 mm hook size is only a guide if you get too many stitches on 10 cm change to a larger hook size if you get too few stitches on 10 cm change to a smaller hook size
